param.label: Focus
param.tip: The browser scrolls to the slider.

param.label: Force full width
param.tip: The slider tries to fill the full width of the browser.

param.name: responsiveForceFullHorizontalSelector
param.label: Adjust slider width to parent selector
param.tip: When the jQuery selector of one of the slider's parent elements is specified, the slider tries to have the width and fill up that element instead of the window.

param.name: responsiveConstrainRatio
param.label: Constrain ratio
param.tip: The size of the slide proportionately changes together with its layers.

param.name: responsiveHeightOffset
param.label: Vertical offset selectors
param.tip: It reduces the heigth of the slide by the height of the particular elements.
